name: Conveyor Chaos (SyrusDrake)
description:
Make sure all the boxes reach their destinations by toggling the right switches.  Exciting!

------------------------------------------------------------------

My second game project and my first larger one. Too large, in fact. It took me way too long for a "practice project" but I'm mostly happy with how it turned out. I learned a lot of new stuff, partially because I implemented features that weren't really necessary but I knew I'd eventually have to learn how to do.

Heavily inspired by an old flash game called "Dachser Global Player"
